title: How Traditional Banking Helps 'Crypto Curious'
itunes:title: How Traditional Banking Helps 'Crypto Curious'
description:
Brad Scrivner, CEO of Vast Bank, discusses cryptocurrency regulation and how the bank is giving individuals confidence to participate in the crypto arena.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
